sources.title: Vote for Huggett
sources.description: “Gets my vote every time” “Good Fun” “Top-flight entry” (IMDB reviews quotes). Third in the series of four Huggett family comedies. Good ensemble cast headed by Jack Warner and Kathleen Harrison. Good production values. Petula sings. Nostalgic fun. Watch it or you'll be haunted by Churchill's ghost! IMDB rating 6.5. Directed by Ken Annakin. Released in 1949 (UK only). Complete print (PAL transfer)

metadata.Plot: A firm of solicitors do battle with the head of the local council over a parcel of river front land, owned by the Huggett family, in order to build a lido/community center.
metadata.Writer: Denis Constanduros, Mabel Constanduros, Allan MacKinnon
metadata.Actors: Jack Warner, Kathleen Harrison, Susan Shaw
